content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2019 Pro Bowl Packages

Our 2019 Pro Bowl packages are fully customizable so you can create the perfect trip to this fun football event. Choose from first class accommodations, tickets anywhere in Camping World Stadium and much more. Join Roadtrips in sunny Florida this January for the perfect winter holiday. Enjoy the game along with the warm sunshine and an endless list of things to see and do in one of America’s most beloved destinations. Complete 2019 Pro Bowl packages available from $1,135 per person (based on double occupancy).

About the 2019 Pro Bowl

In 2019, the Pro Bowl will once again be held in sunny Orlando. Each year, thousands of football fans flock to the NFL’s version of the all-star game to watch the league’s elite players during a fun-filled weekend of their favorite sport. Just in case the game itself isn’t enough to lure you in, the host city just happens to be one of the hottest vacation spots in the country. With an abundance of exciting attractions, natural beauty and great weather, Orlando is an ideal destination whether you’re traveling for a corporate event, with buddies or with the family.
